CustomField.description: Created by oe:gen to work around the 'Authenticated Website' license limitation. These licenses cannot access the Contact record and full name. This field is stamped with the full name when a change is made to the `Programme Participant` record.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Created by oe:gen to work around the 'Authenticated Website' license limitation. These licenses cannot access the Contact record and full name. This field is stamped with the full name when a change is made to the `Programme Participant` record.
CustomField.label: Participant Name
